hero.title: Hi, I'm Fazilabs
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
hero.description: I create amazing digital experiences using cutting-edge technologies. Passionate about building scalable applications and solving complex problems.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience creating digital solutions that make a difference. I specialize in modern web technologies and love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful designs.

experiences.title: Software Security Engineer
experiences.description: Lead development of scalable web applications serving 100K+ users. Architected microservices infrastructure and mentored junior developers.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through optimization
Led team of 5 developers on major product redesign
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
Designed and developed Velociraptor API for ThreatSeal using Python, Flask, and modern cloud technologies.
Contributed to the Sigma Broadcast project with robust threat detection using Java, Spring Boot
Upgraded legacy UI to modern React + TypeScript with graph visualizations
Built Corvex backend using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL

experiences.title: Mobile App Developer
experiences.description: Developed MVP from scratch for tech startup. Built both frontend and backend systems handling gym matching and interactive workout scheduling
achievements: Achieved 99.9% uptime for critical services
Developed full-stack mobile app using React Native, Node js, and later migrated backend to FastAPI
Integrated cloud services: GCP, Firebase, JWT Auth, PostgreSQL, push notifications
Architected modular backend with SQLAlchemy, OAuth, and integration with Google APIs

experiences.title: System Support  Volunteer & System Support Engineer
experiences.description: Created web apps for organization management and smooth running of the organization.
achievements: Supported MEAPPS Loan System; upgraded Loan UI to React 18 with React Query
Led CommCare data workflows and designed training material for youth programs
Implemented efficient React query fetching techniques and pagination to boost system performance
